attributes.additional_details: Because me and millions of people are fed up with you. Taking away our money as if we don’t get taxed enough. Rake some of your 11% pay rises and put that into healthcare and elderly. I work my tits of to pay for everyone els it’s not on
attributes.background: I want you to stop making things our fault. And making us pay for your mess

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596514
